text:
“What kind of operating system does it use?” “Vista”
“We’re going to die!”

Is anyone seeing a “jitter” on load when you refresh HubSpot web pages using V2 Custom Modules? I’m not exactly sure of the cause, but I’m seeing it in a few different portals. All of the sudden when a page loads every time it flashes and jumps back-and-forth between the top and middle of the page. Anyone seeing this?
talking about in the page editor or the live page?
Live page
and in the live preview
It’s super random. Comes and goes
can you post a link?
I can’t right now, the link I had it went away.
ah
I keep seeing it on and off in different portals. It lasts for like 10-30 minutes then goes away.

is there a way for a HubSpot form to block submissions from any domain unless they match a specific list? I know the *Email* field already has the _Email Domains to Block_, but my client's wondering how to allow only a specific set of domains instead. Maybe better through a workflow instead?
a native HubSpot form (rendered through a module) or embedded ?
either or, though my guess is it might come down to some customization of the embed code
to give some further detail, basically they only want to get email addresses from *.edu* domains
My first thought is to just use the embed form, then check against .edu domains before submit
<@U25C6PU56> for the issues your seeing is it something like white box flashes on the page?
im working a site and using a slider on it. When it cycles, i am getting a white flash area now and then
weird though when I did a screen recording, nothing was showing in the recording but it was happening. Hrmmm....
Kind of. It’s like flashes but it’s also jumping on load
sometimes the page loads and stops in the middle instead of the top after the flashing
prepare for critical monitor failure :desktop_computer:
Could also just be a rendering issue in the browser that the screen cap doesn’t see
yea im going to try it on another computer to see if its still screwy then
So who at HubSpot deals with the portals for the local HUG groups? I have some questions about features they have and whats stripped away from them

Does anyone have an example of how they have coded for a custom menu? I have built a menu for a nonHubSpot site and want to use the same formatting as a default menu styling in HubSpot but have no idea how to do that. I am looking for an example of where to put hubl code. Anyone have advice/help?
